Package tuitions

Class TuitionManager

java.lang.Object
tuitions.TuitionManager
public class TuitionManager extends Object
The UI class of this program. The user may input several commands to modify their roster of students. Handles all exceptions and invalid data.
Author:
Tommy Cho

    • majorChecker

      A helper method to determine if a major is valid or not
      Parameters:
      major - Major of a student in string form
      Returns:
      true if the major is valid, false otherwise

    • stateChecker

      public boolean stateChecker(String state)
      A helper method to check whether the state is part of the tri-state area or not
      Parameters:
      state - state the user inputted where they're living in
      Returns:
      true if the state is NY or CT, false otherwise

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if it is a number, false otherwise

      roster - the roster being modified
      command - the input command from the user
